name: CompactO: Idle Game
description:
Create squares, create some more squares inside those squares, and repeat! 

CompactO is an idle game based on creating squares on your planes and earning money. The goal is to unlock the 3D Realm to unlock more planes!

CompactO was made during the 7-Day r/incremental_games Game Jam 2020! Took me 5 days to make what I currently have.

(To be added in the future description):
Infuse your 3D worlds to unlock the shrinkenator to shrink all the squares you've created!

What's coming next?

- Pyramid

- Cube

- Infusing

- SHRINKENATOR
